author: Lucille Clifton
title: the message of crazy horse
text: i would sit in the center of the world, the Black Hills hooped around me and dream of my dancing horse. my wife

author: Mahmoud Darwish
title: The Horse Fell Off the Poem
text: The horse fell off the poem and the Galilean women were wet with butterflies and dew, dancing above chrysanthemum

author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti
title: Don’t Let That Horse . . .
text: Don’t let that horse eat that violin

author: David Allan Evans
title: Girl Riding a Horse in a Field of Sunflowers
text: Sitting perfectly upright, contented and pensive, she holds in one hand, loosely, the reins of summer
